examples.example: 在过去的一年里，我收获了满满的成长与快乐。

translate.english: In the past year, I have gained full growth and happiness.

examples.example: 这一年的经历让我变得更加坚强和自信。

translate.english: The experiences of this year have made me stronger and more confident.

examples.example: 新的一年即将到来，我充满了期待和憧憬。

translate.english: The new year is coming soon, and I am full of expectations and longings.
